title: St. Louis Adjusted Monetary Base (DISCONTINUED)
notes:
Updates of this series will be ceased on December 19, 2019. Interested users can access the not seasonally adjusted version of this series from the H.3 release, BOGMBASEW (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/BOGMBASEW).
For more details, see the FRED Announcement (https://news.research.stlouisfed.org/2019/12/discontinuance-of-st-louis-monetary-base-and-reserves-data/).
